item.title: Pissing in the sacred brook: humanity’s abuse of water
item.author: Adrian Liberto
item.description: As life-sustaining water dwindles, the oceans are rising due to the melting ice caps that are warming because of climate change. Indeed, for many of us, it may well be a case of there being water everywhere, with not a drop of it to drink!
